definition: I've got all the time in the world.
I am on a higher plane, chale, literally!
Wáchale güey, my crew is coming through.
They have no idea how heartless I am.
No one can hold their breath forever.
A clandestine base buried deep within an impenetrable and endless chasm.
A mysterious structure housing an astral conduit.
A two-site map set in a vibrant, underwater city.
A pair of sites split by an elevated center allows for rapid movement.
Beneath a forgotten monastery, a clamour emerges.
A sleek, silenced sidearm proficient at any range.
Attacker. Defender. You're the one with the pump-action shotgun.
Automatic, rapid fire shotgun that provides sustained high damage.
